About Immune-5
settings.info:
Immune -5 is a proprietary blend of natural flavonoids/nutraceuticals that have demonstrated powerful anti-inflammatory action against a wide variety of diseases. The synergistic action of 
these nutraceuticals stimulate the immune system to combat multiple chronic conditions as well as 
creating a defense against viral and bacterial infections.

settings.heading: Powerful Nutraceuticals for Better Health Immune-5

settings.text: Immune -5 is a proprietary blend of natural flavonoids/nutraceuticals that have demonstrated powerful anti-inflammatory action against a wide variety of diseases.

settings.info: “I began taking KellMed Immune 5 in July, 2021, after a squamous cell cancer was removed from my lower left leg.  The open wound on my shin seemed to be getting worse so I began to research products that would promote wound healing.  A miracle was given to me when I found KellMed Immune 5 on Amazon. Within 3 weeks, this horrific wound was healed to my utter amazement. ”
settings.name: Sunshine

settings.info: My vision began to change for the worst several years ago and I was referred by my Ophthalmologist to a Retina specialist as I had developed fluid in the macula of my eyes. Finally, I was diagnosed with a condition that is triggered by taking steroids which causes fluid to accumulate in the macula & therefore, damages vision.  Before seeing my Retina specialist in November, 2021, I knew my vision was beginning to improve but was stunned at the results from my tests. When my Doctor came into my room and said he had never seen anything like this before as the fluid had completely disappeared in my right eye and had been reduced in my left eye.  He asked what I had be doing and I said, “I pray and I take Immune 5”.  I am thankful for my results & hope others can find healing as well. Also, my energy level and sense of well-being have improved.
settings.name: Sunshine

settings.info: “I stand on my feet most of every day as a professional hair dresser. As a result, my legs frequently swell. I had heard about KellMed Immune 5 from a friend who had researched the ingredients in this product & said that Luteolin might help my legs. After 1 week of taking Immune 5, the swelling in my legs disappeared. Remarkable!!  A blessing for me & trust you will enjoy good outcomes as well.”
settings.name: Sand

settings.info: "After taking KellMed Immune 5 for one week, I experienced dramatic changes in the disappearance of a protruding, fluid filled stomach which had been a problem for years. I certainly feel better about the way I look & just have a better sense of well- being all the way around. Thankful to have found this product!!"
settings.name: Donny

settings.info: "I am a 75 year old man & had been taking KellMed Immune 5 when I was diagnosed with a very high PSA count & was to be rechecked several months later.  When I was checked again, my PSA had dropped 10 points to my Doctor’s surprise.  Following the PSA results, I had knee surgery & was really dreading rehab. After 4 days. I scored 120, and at the end of 4 weeks. 125.  The only unknown, Immune 5, is going to be my best friend for a time!"
settings.name: John

settings.info: "I have had “Irritable Bowel Syndrome” for a while. I was introduced to KellMed Immune 5 before Christmas, 2021.   I have had no episodes with my condition since then. Is Immune 5 the cause? ….Don‘t know. Do I feel better?… for sure & I will continue using the product."
settings.name: Virginia
